synanthropy
=========================================================

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


This repository is a temporary patch for <https://github.com/lomorel/SynAnthrop>.
It will be merged in the future.


## Usage

1. Clone this repository
2. Create the folder `data/`
3. Put the CartNat layers inside
4. Put the STOC csv also inside
5. Run the analysis by opening the `make.R`
